long_description: xentricx technologies is a global technology consulting organization specializing in software products. creating values for our customers everyday for their profit. xentricx technologies pvt ltd is an international call center based in pune,solapur india. xentricx technologies company established in 2017 and incorporated in 2020 as a private limited company. we cater to various processes such as customer care, tech support, debt collection, surveys, corporate reception and messaging in the inbound call center domain. in the outbound call center we cater to direct telemarketing, upsell/cross sell, direct mail followup, appointment scheduling and surveys. enhancing the business growth of our customers to deliver high-quality solutions that create value and reliable competitive advantage for our clients around the world. we ensures high quality and cost-effective data conversion solutions through a highly competent and dedicated team of skilled staff. we deliver following services. we collect the contact information of potential targets and maintain strong relationships with prospects and existing clients; and generate qualified leads.

generated_description: xentricx technologies is a company based in solapur north, maharashtra, specializing in inbound and outbound call center services, email support, live chat support, and digital solutions. the company offers staffing solutions and enhances business growth by delivering high-quality, cost-effective data conversion solutions. xentricx technologies provides lead generation, demand generation, and digital marketing services, including social media marketing, search engine optimization, email campaigns, and sms campaigns. they also offer live chat support services and digital solutions such as coding, designing, and development. the company operates offices in pune and mysuru, karnataka.
